user.title: Set up OpenCode
user.description:
This integration allows OpenCode instances to connect and be controlled from Home Assistant.

After setup, use the integration options to pair OpenCode instances.

pair_new.title: Pair New Instance
pair_new.description:
Enter this pairing code in your OpenCode instance:

**{pairing_code}**

Run `/ha-pair` in OpenCode and enter:
- Home Assistant URL: Your HA URL
- Pairing Code: {pairing_code}

This code expires in 5 minutes.
